resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Musical Scales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikalische Skalen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échelles Musicales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escalas Musicais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scale Musicali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσικές κλίμακες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escalas Musicales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Musical Scales Concert Scales and how they are in made for any instrument. Scales covered: C (All Natural) F / Bd / Eb / Ab / Db (Flats) G / D / A / E / B (Sharps) and Chromatic up and down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikal stuft Konzert-Skalen ein und wie sie innen
für jedes mögliches Instrument gebildet werden. Skalen 
bedeckt: C (alles natürliche) F/Bd/Eb/AB/DB (Ebenen) G/D/A/E/B 
(Scharfe) und chromatisches auf und ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le musical mesure des échelles de concert et 
comment elles sont dedans faites pour n'importe quel instrument. 
Échelles couvertes : C (tout le normal) F/Bd/eb/ab/DB 
(appartements) G/D/A/E/B (dièses) et chromatique en haut et en bas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O musical escala escalas do concert e como são 
feitas dentro para todo o instrumento. Escalas cobertas: C
(todo o natural) F/Bd/Eb/Ab/DB (planos) G/D/A/E/B (sharps) e 
ascendente chromatic e para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il musical regola le scale di concerto e come 
dentro sono fatte per tutto lo strumento. Scale coperte: C
(tutto il naturale) F/Bd/eb/ab/Db (appartamenti) G/D/A/E/B (sharps) e 
cromatico su e giù.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μουσικές κλίμακες συμφωνούν τις κλίμακες και πώς 
είναι καμένος για οποιοδήποτε όργανο. Κλίμακες που 
καλύπτονται: Γ (όλοι φυσικοί) φ/BD/$l*eb/av/*DB 
(επίπεδα) γ/δ/Α/ε/β (Sharps) και χρωματικός πάνω-κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El musical escala escalas del concierto y cómo 
adentro se hacen para cualquier instrumento. Escalas cubiertas: 
C (todo el natural) F/Bd/Eb/Ab/DB (planos) G/D/A/E/B 
(sostenidos) y cromático hacia arriba y hacia abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KEVIN SEARS
FN:KEVIN SEARS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107555</entry>
